item.title: Remains found in shallow grave 'believed to be' missing Philadelphia woman: Police

item.title: WATCH: Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano spews lava in latest eruption
item.description: Mount Kilauea, a volcano that has been active in recent years, erupted again on Hawaii’s Big Island, according to the United States Geological Survey.

item.title: Streets filled across the country for 'No Kings' peaceful rallies protesting Trump
item.description: Huge crowds mustered in cities for “No Kings” protests on Saturday in response to what organizers call overreach from President Donald Trump.
